message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this item to you for $95. I think it's a great deal and you'll really get a lot of use out of it.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $75. I'm willing to pay a fair price for the product, but I'm trying to stay within a tight budget.
I understand your budget constraints, Bob, but $75 is too low for me. How about we meet in the middle at $87?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $82?
